name: Shogun
headline: Shogun empowers brands to create exceptional ecommerce experience.
description:
Shogun is an ecommerce experience platform empowering brands to drive higher conversions, revenue, and brand loyalty. Our products Shogun Page Builder and Shogun Frontend help teams build and optimize their online stores to deliver exceptional experiences. Our products integrate with ecommerce platforms like Shopify and BigCommerce, and our 20,000+ customers include Leesa, MVMT, Timbuk2, and Chubbies. Visit www.getshogun.com for more.

We're an inclusive, remote, diverse, and globally distributed team. And we’re hiring!

founders.name: Nick Raushenbush, Founder
founders.description: CEO at Shogun, fmr Cofounder, COO. Fmr Cofounder, COO @ Glass + Marker.

founders.name: Finbarr Taylor, Founder/CEO
founders.description: CTO at Shogun (YC W18). Former Software Engineer at Y Combinator. Scottish in California.

# Create, personalize, optimize—all in one platform
Unlock the power of seamless content creation with built-in personalization and optimization tools. From landing pages to dynamic campaigns, craft ecommerce experiences that engage customers and drive more sales.
[Book a demo](https://getshogun.com/</book-a-demo>)[Start for free](https://getshogun.com/<https:/app.getshogun.com/sign-up>)
![Personalization panel within Shogun's visual editor](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/6671ae477437d7f367dd23ed_personalization-and-visual-editor_hero.webp)

## One seamless solution
Empower your team to create immersive shopping experiences, optimize for more conversions, and deliver personalized content to your customers — without the bloated tech stack.
![Various UI components of Shogun's comprehensive platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/6670b2a9015d9b5a42cb1c13_Comprehensive%20Solution%20Image%20-%20Dark%20\(8\).webp)
![Various UI components of Shogun's comprehensive platform](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/6670b763259420678dc12456_Comprehensive%20Solution%20Image%20-%20Dark%20\(Mobile\)%20\(1\).webp)
## CRAFT EXPERIENCES
##  VISUALLY
### [Tailor your page structureTake complete control of your page structure with an intuitive visual editor without ever thinking about code.Explore the visual editor.](https://getshogun.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)### [Design the way you wantShowcase your brand’s distinct style with advanced merchandising features.](https://getshogun.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)### [Create dynamically rich contentLink CMS and ecommerce platform data with custom elements to create dynamic shopping experiences.Read about the CMS.](https://getshogun.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)### [Optimize for SEOImprove your SEO and increase your organic reach with a complete set of SEO features and performance optimization tools.Learn about SEO benefits.](https://getshogun.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)### [Launch quicklyForget subdomains — publish new pages directly to the web natively through your ecommerce platform.](https://getshogun.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)

## OPTIMIZE
##  TO PERFECTION
## Experiment natively
Cut the need for third-party tooling and run A/B tests on your Shogun created pages natively within your ecommerce platform for improved performance and faster results.
[discover a/b testing![Arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/66144d3ba8ba0a6df18c42a4_Neon-Right-Arrow-Icon.svg)](https://getshogun.com/<https:/getshogun.com/features/ab-testing/>)
![Elements from Shogun's A/B Testing UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/66144af2b7995560a84d6d7f_AB-Testing.webp)
## Test at scale
Build experiments that test against many variants at once or run multiple unique A/B tests simultaneously to uncover growth opportunities faster.
[Try Shogun Now![Arrow pointing up and to the right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/66144db7d766643168f2b802_Neon-Up-Right-Arrow-Icon.svg)](https://getshogun.com/<https:/app.getshogun.com/sign-up>)
![Variants and traffic distribution UI from Shogun's A/B Testing feature](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/66144b515aca77b24d7e063e_AB-Testing-Variants.webp)
## Measure and optimize
Review performance with native analytics to make the data-driven decisions you need to reach your next level of growth.
[Try Shogun Now![Arrow pointing up and to the right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/66144db7d766643168f2b802_Neon-Up-Right-Arrow-Icon.svg)](https://getshogun.com/<https:/app.getshogun.com/sign-up>)
![Elements from Shogun's Native Page Analytics UI](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/661454b6ba94dc4d4aa054ed_Native-Page-Analytics.webp)

### personalization
#### Deliver relevant experiences
Create personalized shopping experiences built for specific customer segments — prevent irrelevant copy, images and products from standing in the way of sales ever again.
[learn more about personalization![Arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/66145d0ee538a315aa977483_Purple-Right-Arrow-Icon.svg)](https://getshogun.com/<https:/getshogun.com/features/personalization/>)

## organically
## Get the right insights
Uncover the most crucial optimizations needed using Shogun Insights to detect opportunities to improve page speed, accessibility and on-page SEO.
[Try Shogun Now![Arrow pointing up and to the right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/66144db7d766643168f2b802_Neon-Up-Right-Arrow-Icon.svg)](https://getshogun.com/<https:/app.getshogun.com/sign-up>)

Edit and optimize meta titles and descriptions manually or with the power of AI to boost your search rankings and attract more organic visitors.

Publish SEO optimized blog content on your own or with the power of AI to tell your brand’s story and attract more organic visitors.

## What it's like to scale with Shogun
[![Nextbase product image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/6650edbdb97f11e8157bc8d0_Nextbase_Case-Study-Image.webp)Nextbase boosts conversions by 122% with Personalization for past customersread the case study![Arrow pointing right](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/66144d3ba8ba0a6df18c42a4_Neon-Right-Arrow-Icon.svg)](https://getshogun.com/<https:/getshogun.com/case-studies/nextbase-personalized-experiences>)
“BondiBoost isn’t a startup, but we move fast. Having a tool like Shogun in our stack helps us move quickly and experiment across our three markets, which is critical to the business.”
![April Porter Headshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/6616f633208d140004acfbdf_april-porter-headshot-1.webp)
APRIL PORTER, CREATIVE MANAGER AT **BONDIBOOST**
“...Phenomenal app. Slight learning curve at the beginning, but after a couple hours you will have it down…One of the best, if not the best, no code page builders out there. Can do pretty much anything with it and it is simple to use. Highly recommend, 10/10!”
![Shopify Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/6616f639d28d78c2db89cf5d_Shopify-Icon-1.webp)
JERSEYBIRD, **SHOPIFY APP STORE**
"Very good customer support! Personalized help from a real human, just switched from Replo for a 1/4 of the price too.”
![Shopify Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/6616f639d28d78c2db89cf5d_Shopify-Icon-1.webp)
UPTOWNATTIRE, **SHOPIFY APP STORE**
“I don’t have words to express how this app is helping to grow our business. This app is very helpful in creating [a] brand’s landing page, collection pages, etc.”
![Shopify Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/6616f639d28d78c2db89cf5d_Shopify-Icon-1.webp)
JPC EQUESTRIAN, **SHOPIFY APP STORE**
“When building custom pages we’d end up with really colorless pages for a very colorful brand… but with Shogun, we’ve been able to infuse that color without having to get our dev team involved.”
![Dylan Kim Headshot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/661d476402fb4b695152cfea_dylan-kim-headshot.webp)
DYLAN KIM, CO-FOUNDER, **BREVITE**
“Their support team was extremely helpful and quick to respond when I was having trouble with a layout issue. They even provided a video guide, using the page I was working on, to show me what I needed to fix. Would definitely recommend!”
![Shopify Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/6616f639d28d78c2db89cf5d_Shopify-Icon-1.webp)
RACHEL COMEY, **SHOPIFY APP STORE**
"I love Shogun. I'm able to create custom pages, custom footers on existing product pages and integrate them all seamlessly into my Shopify page, without the need for coding…I have tried most of the Shopify page builder apps available and I've found this to be the most stable and user friendly. Definitely recommend.”
![Shopify Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f36a007b9322599125cdb7/6616f639d28d78c2db89cf5d_Shopify-Icon-1.webp)
LOVESKIN, **SHOPIFY APP STORE**

## Everything you need in one comprehensive platform
### create
#### Visual editor
Create powerful shopping experiences

![Nextbase product image⟨13⟩Nextbase boosts conversions by 122% with Personalization for past customersread the case study![Arrow pointing right⟨52⟩]](https://getshogun.com/<https:/getshogun.com/case-studies/nextbase-personalized-experiences>)
“BondiBoost isn’t a startup, but we move fast. Having a tool like Shogun in our stack helps us move quickly and experiment across our three markets, which is critical to the business.”
![April Porter Headshot⟨64⟩]
APRIL PORTER, CREATIVE MANAGER AT **BONDIBOOST**
“...Phenomenal app. Slight learning curve at the beginning, but after a couple hours you will have it down…One of the best, if not the best, no code page builders out there. Can do pretty much anything with it and it is simple to use. Highly recommend, 10/10!”
![Shopify Icon⟨65⟩]
JERSEYBIRD, **SHOPIFY APP STORE**
"Very good customer support! Personalized help from a real human, just switched from Replo for a 1/4 of the price too.”
![Shopify Icon⟨65⟩]
UPTOWNATTIRE, **SHOPIFY APP STORE**
“I don’t have words to express how this app is helping to grow our business. This app is very helpful in creating [a] brand’s landing page, collection pages, etc.”
![Shopify Icon⟨65⟩]
JPC EQUESTRIAN, **SHOPIFY APP STORE**
“When building custom pages we’d end up with really colorless pages for a very colorful brand… but with Shogun, we’ve been able to infuse that color without having to get our dev team involved.”
![Dylan Kim Headshot⟨66⟩]
DYLAN KIM, CO-FOUNDER, **BREVITE**
“Their support team was extremely helpful and quick to respond when I was having trouble with a layout issue. They even provided a video guide, using the page I was working on, to show me what I needed to fix. Would definitely recommend!”
![Shopify Icon⟨65⟩]
RACHEL COMEY, **SHOPIFY APP STORE**
"I love Shogun. I'm able to create custom pages, custom footers on existing product pages and integrate them all seamlessly into my Shopify page, without the need for coding…I have tried most of the Shopify page builder apps available and I've found this to be the most stable and user friendly. Definitely recommend.”
![Shopify Icon⟨65⟩]
LOVESKIN, **SHOPIFY APP STORE**

generated_description:
**Shogun: Crafting Exceptional E-commerce Experiences**

Founded in 2015, Shogun began as an e-commerce experience platform and has since evolved into a powerhouse for brands looking to optimize their online stores for better engagement and conversions. The mission is straightforward: Shogun empowers brands to create exceptional e-commerce experiences. By providing tools like the Shogun Page Builder and Shogun Frontend, they enable businesses to build and personalize their online presence efficiently.

The company operates seamlessly with popular platforms like Shopify and BigCommerce, boasting a clientele of over 20,000 brands, including notable names like Leesa, MVMT, Timberland, and Chubbies. Based in San Carlos, California, Shogun has grown to a diverse team of around 90 members and is currently part of Y Combinator’s Batch W18, with Michael Seibel as one of the group partners guiding their journey.

### Key Features and Capabilities:
Shogun's product suite includes essential features such as:

- **Visual Editor:** An intuitive drag-and-drop interface that removes the coding barrier, allowing businesses to craft beautiful pages effortlessly.
- **CMS Functionality:** Enables brands to create and manage dynamic content at a scalable level.
- **A/B Testing:** A feature that allows users to experiment with various layouts and elements to find the best performing configurations.
- **Personalization Tools:** Engage customers with tailored content based on their preferences and browsing behavior.
- **Integrated Page Analytics:** Provides insights into how pages are performing, enabling data-driven decisions.

### Target Audience:
Shogun primarily serves e-commerce managers and agencies, giving them the tools to drive growth and improve customer engagement through richer, more immersive content experiences. They also support companies in managing multiple brand sites and optimizing for SEO, ensuring that client brands stand out in the crowded digital marketplace.

### Workplace Culture and Recruitment:
Adopting a model that encourages inclusivity, Shogun operates as a remote and globally distributed team. Their culture emphasizes diversity and innovation as they continue to expand. They're actively hiring, offering opportunities to individuals who share a passion for enhancing e-commerce.

In the rapidly changing world of online retail, Shogun stands out not just for its powerful tools but also for its commitment to supporting brands and agencies in crafting memorable shopping experiences. Whether you’re looking to try out their features or dive deeper into e-commerce strategies, Shogun presents a comprehensive solution.

For more information, visit [Shogun's website](https://getshogun.com/).
